title: Borderlands 3 Gameplay Reveal Details - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.01.19
description:
Get Freshly dipped strawberries at http://berries.com with promo code: KFGAMES

Get one dozen assorted roses for $19.99  at http://proflowers.com and use promo code: KFGAMES

Tim and Gary go through all the Borderlands 3 announcements, Days Gone patches, Sega troubles, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:03:42 - Housekeeping
Vancouver Meet and Greet is SATURDAY! - May 4th - kindafunny.com/events
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:Tom Bock, Black Jack, James Davis, and Mohammed Mohammed.
The Roper Report   -
00:04:34 - Borderlands 3 Gameplay Reveal - IGN.com, Jonathon Dornbush
00:17:53 - Days Gone Has Gotten A New Patch Nearly Ever Day Since Launch (Joshus Rivera Kotaku)
00:23:50 - Tommy Tallarico announces new Earthworm Jim game with original team, exclusive to Intellivision Amico
00:28:19 - Sega Refocusing On Existing IP (Adam Bankhurst IGN)
00:34:12 - Smash Bros Info
00:36:30 - Cool Thing: Shovel Knight is Actually 3D
00:37:42 - Out today
00:41:05 -  Sherries Berries
00:42:22 - ProFlowers
Reader mail   -
00:43:45 - Are the people working on the sonic upset?- 2038 Pokémon CEO
00:50:20 - WHAT THE FUCK IS RAGE 2 EVEN SUPPOSED TO BE? - Daze
00:52:00 - Borderlands: looter shooter or shooter looter? - Tommyboy
00:52:28 - Squad Up: Anthony Ragucci (PS4) - RedWolfCrusader
00:53:21 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Fran and Lucy James
